name: Baffin Chloe Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
description: Take on winter's worst. From Baffin's Drift series, these warm and waterproof boots are ready for everyday wear in sub-zero cold. The removable liner comes out for easy drying, in the unlikely event that it gets wet.Durable suede upper with a waterproof Arctic Rubber shell.Faux-fur collar locks in heat.The toggled, wide lacing provides a secure fit.Removable multi-layer inner boot with a plush next-to-foot surface.EVA midsole provides a good combination of fatigue-reducing support and underfoot cushioning.Polar Rubber outsole for winter traction.Active temperature rating is -40°C.
